# The Python interface is contained into the python package bcmPy, to work
# it needs the C interfaces generated by the bcminterfacescompile.py.in,
# therefore the CMake codes copy the interface into the install directory, then
# it copyes the configure file with the correct paths for the library and
# launches it
if(BUILD_PYTHON_INTERFACE AND BUILD_SHARED_LIBS)
	install(DIRECTORY bcmPy DESTINATION interfaces)

	configure_file(
		"${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bcminterfacescompile.py.in"
		"${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/interfaces/bcmPy/bcminterfacescompile.py"
		@ONLY
	)
endif(BUILD_PYTHON_INTERFACE AND BUILD_SHARED_LIBS)
